0.title: Staring Contest
0.plot:
Know what this is about?
 Be the first one to add a plot.

1.title: Zeke's Last Ride
1.plot: A severe knee injury threatens Zeke's career.

2.title: The Unusual Suspects
2.plot: Zeke moves into the garage, far away his parents, the evil Ginger, and her annoying torment. But after his first night in the new pad, Zeke turns up missing. With his best bud as the victim of foul play, Luther sets out to find the assailant.

3.title: Two Guys, a Car, and a Wild Bear
3.plot: Zeke and Luther's sponsor Riot Skates has given them an awesome new car! When the boys can't afford to refill the tank, they rig the engine to run on restaurant grease instead. But the next morning, they discover a wild bear enjoying a greasy snack!

4.title: Hyp-Bro-Tized
4.plot: Luther, who has developed an intense crush on local hottie Bridget, visits Dr. Ricardo's office in search of confidence. When the doc hypnotizes him into believing he is a super suave and confident ladies man, people are impressed by this new Luth.

5.title: Daredevils!
5.plot: Zeke, Luth, and Kojo are invited to meet Bobby Dicey, the world's greatest daredevil. Bobby explains that the three of them have been recruited to compete for a coveted spot on "Team Dicey," an exclusive group of daredevils in training.

6.title: Sibling Rivalries
6.plot: Eddie Colletti has lined up an appearance for Zeke and Luther on Skate Cribs. But when the host Dezzy asks to interview Ginger and Roy for the show, the bros sense major sabotage potential and decide to hire actors to play their younger sibs.

7.title: Luther Turns Four
7.plot: On Luther's Birthday, Luther has to go and play on a pee wee basketball team and also has to play other sports too

8.title: Head of Skate
8.plot: Don's twin brother Ron Donaldson is running unopposed in the upcoming mayoral race and plans to turn Don's Donuts into a sleek condominium complex. Zeke realizes that in order to save Don's, he must enter the race himself.

9.title: Zeke, Luther and Kojo Strike Gold
9.plot: The new Vice Principal at Buzz Johnson High asks Zeke and Luther if they would help her test the school's security system by stealing a historical artifact called Sutter's Nugget from its display case in the school's lobby.

10.title: Zeke and Lu's New Crew
10.plot: When Bridget points out that Zeke and Luther have a posse, they notice a group of boys following them around - Paulie Glover who functions as a one man pit crew, Teddy who keeps the bros fed and hydrated, and their bodyguard Omar.

11.title: Skater Girl Island
11.plot: Riot wants to add a female skater to the team for the upcoming "Roll Into Summer" promo tour, and Eddie Coletti informs Zeke and Luther that they must hire the new addition. With their work cut out for them, they set out to find Skater Girl Island.

12.title: DJ PJ
12.plot: One night when Luther runs off, Zeke follows him to Don's open mic night, whereupon Luther suddenly takes the stage as DJ PJ and performs an amazingly impressive rap. The only problem is he is still asleep!

13.title: Trucky Cheese
13.plot: While cleaning out Carl's storage unit, Zeke and Luther discover a working food truck. The boys decide to start their own business selling Luther's signature beverage, cheese smoothies.

14.title: Ice Heist, Baby
14.plot: A heat wave has hit Gilroy and the entire town is a sweaty, uncomfortable mess. When Luther's Nana asks him to buy her a bag of ice, the guys discover that the evil owner of Gilroy Ice Company has the monopoly on ice and is hiking up the price!

15.title: Skate Troopers
15.plot: Zeke and Luther are guest starring on Skate Troopers, a show about futuristic skaters who battle intergalactic evil. A huge fan, Luther is ecstatic about playing a Skate Trooper on TV.

16.title: Bro, Where's Our Car?
16.plot: Zeke and Luther have been so busy promoting Riot Skates that they decide they need a break and make plans to spend the day at the beach with two local cuties. But, Eddie Coletti insists that the boys meet the owner of Riot Industries at the same time.

17.title: Lie Hard
17.plot: For the past six months, Luther has been receiving packages from the Smlurvens, a well-off couple who believe he is a child in need. Luth has successfully pretended to be underprivileged, but now the Smlurvens are in Gilroy and want to feed him in person!

18.title: Bro'd Trip
18.plot: Zeke and Luther get invited to participate in the Tempe Invitational, the biggest skate competition on the west coast... but first they have to get there.

19.title: The Gingernator
19.plot: Zeke finds a behavior modifying microchip and plants in on his sister in hopes of taming her evilness. Shockingly, Ginger becomes nice. It is not long before Zeke starts to appreciate his sister, but Luther notices another side of her.

20.title: Skate Video Awards
20.plot: The Ramps crew is stoked when they learn that the International Skate Awards will be held in Gilroy this year! Planning to compete in the best skate videos category, Zeke and Luther meet with their manger Eddie Coletti, seeking a little skate vid money.

21.title: Skate or Swim
21.plot: Zeke and Luther take a young skater under their wing.

22.title: Inside Luther's Brain
22.plot: At one time or another, every kid feels stupid. This is one man's journey to overcome his idiocy.

23.title: Kojo Loses His Mojo
23.plot: Last year Kojo won the Gilroy 10 Mile Championship and Zeke is determined to win back the title.

24.title: Accidental Hero
24.plot: Tired of living in his best bro's shadow, Luther decides it's his time to shine.

25.title: There's No Business Like Bro Business: Part 1
25.plot: Zeke and Luther head to Hollywood in hopes of winning a TV show contest!

26.title: There's No Buisness Like Bro Business: Part 2
26.plot:
Know what this is about?
 Be the first one to add a plot.

27.title: Fence Fishing
27.plot:
Know what this is about?
 Be the first one to add a plot.

28.title: Lie Detector
28.plot:
Know what this is about?
 Be the first one to add a plot.

29.title: Sk8 Mile
29.plot:
Know what this is about?
 Be the first one to add a plot.

0.title: Meat Belt Run
0.plot:
Know what this is about?
 Be the first one to add a plot.

1.title: Bros Go Pro
1.plot: Zeke and Luther get their first professional job when a mattress store hires them to do a skateboard jump as part of a promotional grand-opening stunt.

2.title: Donut Jockey
2.plot: The guys deliver donuts to earn money but Luther loses his donuts to some clever kids and one of Zeke's customers develops a serious crush on him.

3.title: Crash and Learn
3.plot: Kojo is blamed for the damage when Zeke and Luther accidentally fling themselves into Mr. Johnson's yard with a bungee cord, destroying his lawn ornaments.

4.title: Pilot
4.plot: Zeke and Luther come up with ambitious stunts to impress potential sponsors.

5.title: Cape Fear
5.plot: Zeke agrees to let Olivia design his signature look, but isn't impressed with what she comes up with; Ozzie steals Luther's helmet styling.

6.title: Skate Camp
6.plot: Zeke and Luther start a skateboarding camp for neighborhood kids, but their most difficult student turns out to be Ozzie. Ginger challenges a worthy adversary to a flute-off contest.

7.title: Luck Be a Rodent Tonight
7.plot: In an attempt to out-do Kojo and post the highest rated skateboarding clip on the Internet, Zeke and Luther hire Stinky Cast as their videographer. However, their only copy of the finished video is eaten by Luther's pet rat.

8.title: The Big Red Stacking Machine
8.plot: Zeke assumes Luther is as focused as he is on breaking the two-man butt-boarding record. However, the allure of potential fame and fortune diverts Luther's attention to a new sport.

9.title: Summer School
9.plot: In order to get out of summer school, Zeke challenges his algebra teacher - who was an avid skateboarder back in his youth - to a skate-off. Meanwhile, Stinky Cast uses his best dance moves to try to impress Ginger.

10.title: Haunted Board
10.plot: Zeke and Luther are stoked after they purchase El Ojo De Gato (The Eye of the Cat): a one-of-a-kind skateboard. But things get freaky when the board appears to have a mind of its own. Meanwhile, Ginger agrees to be part of Stinky Cast's Halloween costume if Stinky Cast can actually scare her.

11.title: Road Trip
11.plot: Zeke and Luther return from a visit to the birthplace of their favorite skateboarder, Tony Hawk, with an autographed pair of Tony's boxers. But they soon realize that it's impossible to share such a prized memento equally. Meanwhile, Ginger is worried that she has lost her prank-pulling mojo, so she digs deep to create her greatest practical joke.

12.title: Luther Leads
12.plot: Zeke decides to let Luther call the shots for a day. Luther's bad decision-making winds up with the guys being detained by an oppressive life guard, Rex Manly.

13.title: Soul Bucket
13.plot: Luther makes up a story to his grandmother that he is in a successful rock band, but when she wants his band to play at her birthday party, Luther and Zeke attempt to fake their way through a musical performance. Ginger tries to replace Poochie as her best friend.

14.title: Not My Sister's Keeper
14.plot: Zeke is thrilled to learn there is a contest where he can win an awesome new skateboard - all he has to do is be the last man standing, holding on to the prize. Unfortunately, the contest falls on the same day in which he's supposed to baby-sit Ginger.

15.title: Rollerdorks
15.plot: A rival group of roller skaters, the "Rollerdorks," move in on the primo skating real estate of Ramps Plus. Luther falls for a member of the group, Charlene - much to the chagrin of Zeke, Kojo and Ozzie.

16.title: Crash Dummies
16.plot: Ginger plans her own surprise party to impress a boy.

17.title: Adventure Boy
17.plot: Zeke and Luther are big fans of TV risk-taker, Rutger Murdoch, so when the boys meet him at Don's they are really excited. That is until they realize he's in town to see Zeke's crush, Olivia.

18.title: I, Skatebot
18.plot: When the police won't do anything about the neighborhood kids skating around his electronics shop, Mr. Fitzle uses his electronics prowess to build a skater-hating robot. When the bot terrorizes the town, it's up to Zeke and Luther to save the day.

19.title: Law and Boarder
19.plot: When Zeke and Luther crash into a customer at Ginger's Potato Wedge stand, she vows revenge and seeks help from Jumpsuit Johnson.

20.title: A Very Hairy Problem
20.plot: When Sammy The Ape is in town shooting the skateboarding movie, "The Great Skatin' Ape," Zeke gets selected to be Sammy's stunt double.

21.title: Skate Squad
21.plot: To get out of P.E., Zeke, Luther, Kojo and Ozzie form a fake skate team. All goes smoothly until their "team" is challenged to a skate relay and Zeke must bring his independent skaters together to form a real team.

0.title: Fish Baseball
0.plot:
Know what this is about?
 Be the first one to add a plot.

1.title: Zeke Jumps the Shark
1.plot: An 8-foot tiger shark has been captured in Gilroy Bay, but not before attacking Kirby Cheddar. When Kirby whispers to Luther: "Jump the shark," it does not take long before the media finds out and the whole town buzzes about this incredible stunt!

2.title: Tall Stack of Waffles
2.plot: When Luther learns that he will grow to reach seven feet tall, he abandons his dreams of becoming a pro-skater. So, Zeke enlists the world's fattest motocross rider to demonstrate to Luther that an athlete can still bring it, despite physical limitations.

3.title: Airheads
3.plot: When Zeke and Luther's skating goes into a slump, they seek a new hobby to give their skating skills a breather. So, Luther convinces Zeke to join an "air band" with him, Kojo, and Ozzie all playing various "air" instruments.

4.title: Luther Unleashed
4.plot: Now a regular fixture at Ramps, Ozzie has evolved into a grade-A poser. With Luther at his wit's end, Zeke steps in and designates Ozzie as Ramps' official skate photog, with an ulterior motive to keep him occupied.

5.title: Old Nasty
5.plot: While Zeke and Luther build the biggest and most dangerous grind-rail the world has ever seen, Zeke's little sister Ginger imposes on his turf by taking up skating and hanging out at Ramps.

6.title: Double Crush
6.plot: Zeke and Luther realize that there is only one thing they are missing that all the top skaters have: girlfriends. They both fall for a female BMX rider and stage an extreme competition to win her over.

7.title: Plunk Hunting
7.plot: Zeke and Luther's archenemies and barber wannabes Charlie and Doyce Plunk steal Nana's wig. After a confrontation with the brothers, the boys call for backup and a dangerous chase with the Plunks ensues.

8.title: Kojo BFF
8.plot:
Know what this is about?
 Be the first one to add a plot.

9.title: One Strange Night
9.plot: Kirby Cheddar brings his snow cone machine to Zeke and Luther's sleepover and Kojo insists on using a fancy imported blue syrup for the snow cones. When the boys wake up the next morning, they have no recollection of the previous night!

10.title: Luther Waffles and the Skateboard of Doom
10.plot: When Zeke and Luther see a tv ad looking for amazing skaters to test out the latest high tech gadgetry, the boys know instantly that they've found their dream job!

11.title: Crouching Zeke, Dancing Luther
11.plot: Zeke dreams of a nearly impossible trick in which he balances atop his board while it stands vertically. He sets out to do it in real life, asking his mailman Mr. Ng, who doubles as a karate master, for help.

12.title: Luther Waffles: Skate Cop
12.plot: Deputy Dingle requires Zeke and Luther to participate in the station's Police Ride-Along Program, and Luther really takes to the job. When Dingle then discovers his pool has been drained, he enlists the help of his new junior deputy to solve the crime.

13.title: Treasure
13.plot: While cleaning the dumpster behind Don's Donuts, Zeke and Luther stumble upon a mysterious leather satchel full of unique clues. Following the clues one by one, the boys eventually discover a secret passageway at Don's and unearth a stash of cash!

14.title: Rocket Men
14.plot: Zeke and Luther hope to reach a tremendous speed by strapping a fan to Zeke's back, but quickly realize it won't achieve the sonic boom they need. Later when they sneak into Jumpsuit's garage against his orders, they discover an actual rocket!

15.title: Board in Class
15.plot: Nana's man friend Carl is Zeke and Luther's shop teacher, so the boys neglect their work thinking they've got an easy "A". When Carl proposes marriage to Nana, she declines, sending Carl into a funk and the boys into a panic.

16.title: Local Heroes
16.plot: Zeke and Luther get jobs at a video game store where they get held up at gunpoint... or so they think. When they realize there was no robber, just a customer talking to his dog, the guys set out stage a robbery so they can be heroes instead of fools.

17.title: Super Shredder
17.plot: When Zeke and Luther help a strange man get back on a board for the first time in years, the man decides to quit his job and skate full time. The guys truly admire this bold move, until they figure out that he is famous wrestler "The Death Ripper."

18.title: Little Bro, Big Trouble
18.plot: The only thing Luther's younger brother, Roy wants to do is stay in his room playing video games. With encouragement from Zeke, Luther decides to spend some quality time with his brother.

19.title: Robo-Luth
19.plot: When Luth has a wipe out, he's given a hydraulic knee.

20.title: The Bro List
20.plot: Luther discovers his family is moving to Topeka, Kansas and decides that he and Zeke need to complete their "Bro List," a list of what they want to accomplish before they die, before he leaves. After they complete everything, Luther finds out his family is only moving a few blocks to Topeka Road.

21.title: Seoul Bros
21.plot: Zeke and Luther go to great lengths to attract the attention of skate manager Max Randall, but when they get the opportunity... are they really ready?

22.title: Ball of Trash
22.plot: Through the years, instead of getting rid of their trash, the guys have been accumulating it and it has now taken the form of a giant trash ball. Zeke and Luther now need to figure out a way to get rid of it.

23.title: Sludge
23.plot: Kojo is head over heels in love with Zeke's cousin, Mia. But, when Mia learns about Kojo's Black Book of Female Ladies she doesn't want anything to do with him. His only recourse is a grand romantic gesture... jumping the Gilroy Sludge pool.

24.title: Goin' Zoomin'
24.plot: When Zeke and Luther make a skate video that soars in popularity, they get offers to be sponsored. The guys see dollar signs and go with a big corporation, but the big corporation is only interested in marketing Zeke and Luther as a product.

25.title: Bro-Ho-Ho
25.plot: Zeke and Luther get jobs as a mall Santa and elf. Kirby Cheddar visits. Luther meanwhile tells Kirby's mom that Kirby wants a special skateboard, two of them that both Zeke and Luther want. So, they get their gift from Kirby as he says he didn't want it. Zeke and Luther then try to make it better, although they can't find the gift he wants. So they give him a football. Santa magically changes it to what he wants. But it all ends up happily. Santa Claus teaches Ginger the true meaning of Christmas.

imdb.title: Zeke and Luther
plot: Two best friends set their sights on becoming the world's greatest skateboarders.::Anonymous
